The video has been viewed more than 1: 000 times on Facebook, indicating its reach and potential impact on viewers.
The Romanian: language caption accompanying the video urges people not to accept the Covid-19 vaccine, claiming it is the sign of the beast and will result in the loss of their soul.
The video shows people dressed in white: followed by the appearance of Bill Gates's face in the sky. A voice-over in German claims that the vaccine is being used to implant a microchip for total control.
Health experts: including Waseem Khawaja and Nigel McMillan, have dismissed the claim that Covid-19 vaccines contain microchips, stating that such technology does not exist and urging people to ignore conspiracy theories.
